n0:createOracleTypeSpec.n0:source: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE TYPE "HHA_PROD"."ATTEND_TYPE" as object ( EMP_NO varchar2(200), Month_Year varchar2(200), Year_Month varchar2(200), ST_ENAME varchar2(200), P_DATE varchar2(200), Legal_Employer varchar2(200), Internal_address varchar2(200), Branch varchar2(200), Position varchar2(200), EMAIL varchar2(200), EMAIL_UNIQUE varchar2(200), Tot_Ded_Perc varchar2(200), ST_BASIC varchar2(200), NTOT_DED_AMT varchar2(200), DEDUCTIBLE_HOURS_TOT varchar2(200), DEDUCTIBLE_HOURS_FORMAT varchar2(200), REMARKS_Absent_Cnt varchar2(200), REMARKS_Incomp_Cnt varchar2(200), Exempt_Late varchar2(200), Exempt_Out_Early varchar2(200), Exempt_incmplt varchar2(200), Exmpt_time varchar2(200), Exmpt_Min varchar2(200), REMARKS_Leave_Cnt varchar2(200), REMARKS_Day_Off_Cnt varchar2(200), REMARKS_Late_Cnt varchar2(200), REMARKS_Out_Early_Cnt varchar2(200), REMARKS_Half_Incomp_Cnt varchar2(200), REMARKS_Half_Absent_Cnt varchar2(200) ) /
